external_references.description: Bermejo, L., et al. (2017, June 22). Following the Trail of BlackTech’s Cyber Espionage Campaigns. Retrieved May 5, 2020.
Hada, H. (2021, December 28).  Flagpro The new malware used by BlackTech. Retrieved March 25, 2022.

description: [BlackTech](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0098) has used spearphishing e-mails with malicious password-protected archived files (ZIP or RAR) to deliver malware.(Citation: TrendMicro BlackTech June 2017)(Citation: NTT Security Flagpro new December 2021)
